p: Moreover, large numbers of procedures, such as cell lyophilization and disruption, treatments using organic or inorganic reagents, the calibration standard, etc., were all needed in these traditional biochemical methods. In summary, these traditional biochemical methods described above are time-consuming, heavily polluting and require a large amount of equipment. Thus, there is a pressing need for developing reliable, environment-friendly and fast methods to analyze cellular composition in numerous researches for Aurantiochytrium sp.
